item.title: Anyone help me turn this ::yell into a donator command
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:9, topic:539331”][quote author=haviland4 link=topic=658166.msg4402557#msg4402557 date=1390992858]

Under the if conditional check, add this:

if (c.issDonator == 0) { c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator to be able to yell"); return; }

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("yell")) { if (c.issDonator == 0) { c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator to be able to yell"); return; }

Like this??
[/quote]Yes exactly like that.[/quote]

Thanks so you know what is a good pi 317 server? stable tbh ready to host for players
i did try trisidiax v3 but laggs out at like 8 players - now on deathlypvpz with 20 players no lagg but i wanted to search for a new project and thanks for the help bud

item.title: Anyone help me turn this ::yell into a donator command
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:2, topic:539331”]It will be something like this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("yell")) {
	if (c.isDonator()) { // your actual donator check will differ
		for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
			if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
				Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
			}
		}
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator to use this command.");
	}
}

p.s. you might want to fix up your initial if check, it looks terrible.[/quote]

Seem to be getting 100 errors if i replace the ::yell with yours maybe i could upload my commands.java and let you try and replace it for me if you dont mind mate.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone help me turn this ::yell into a donator command

item.title: Anyone help me turn this ::yell into a donator command
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

It will be something like this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("yell")) {
	if (c.isDonator()) { // your actual donator check will differ
		for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
			if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
				Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
			}
		}
		// Add rest of command logic here...
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("You need to be a donator to use this command.");
	}
}

p.s. you might want to fix up your initial if check, it looks terrible.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone help me turn this ::yell into a donator command

item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[b]I Wanna make this command for donators+ and when normal players type the command ::yell message:this is only for donators only to become a donator do ::donate

		[code]}
		if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("Yell") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("YELL") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("yel"))  
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];[/b][/code]
